[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” bottom_divider_style=”mountains2″ bottom_divider_color=”#669d35″ bottom_divider_height=”54px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ width=”100%”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.jacouleengineering.com//wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Safety_Worker.jpg” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ filter_contrast=”130%” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_blur=”150px” filter_saturate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” filter_saturate__hover=”40%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_team_member name=”Quality, Health, Safety, Security & Environment” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”51px” position_text_align=”center” background_color=”rgba(102,157,53,0.78)” custom_margin=”-26px|||-29vw|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px|||0vw|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||0vw|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”10px||10px||false|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ header_font_size_tablet=”45px” header_font_size_phone=”30px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_blur=”30px”][/et_pb_team_member][et_pb_team_member _builder_version=”4.2.1″ body_text_align=”justify” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”15px” custom_margin=”1vw||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”2vw||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|25px|10px|25px|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%”]

As a company, Quality, Health, Safety, Security and Environmental issues take precedence in every aspect of our operations.

Quality

We handle every project with a commitment to excellence and continually improving our processes in order to deliver for all stakeholders.

Health

The physical, mental and emotional well-being of employees is extremely important to us. At JACOULE, we believe that a healthy employee is a happy and more productive employee. So we promote a healthy living lifestyle at work, home and in play

Safety

In order to ensure safe and incident free operations, we adhere to the highest safety standards and never compromise safety. It is a core value here at JACOULE and we approach safety with a mindset that values the life and dignity of every human being. The safety of our employees, our partners critical assets and minimizing the risk of workplace injury is of upmost priority to us.

Security

Operating in sometime volatile environments, we strive to always be a step ahead, by continually evaluating obvious risks and planning for future possible events.

Environment

We leverage technology in delivering sustainable solutions to our clients in a cost effective way and minimizing the impact of our operations on the environment.

We also comply with all applicable QHSSE laws, regulations and industry requirements related to our work activities in whichever field and environment we operate.

    [/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
